headline: S&P Global to Present Next Phase of its Growth Strategy and Medium-Term Financial Targets at Investor Day 2025
summary: S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI) will present the next phase of its growth strategy at its 2025 Investor Day today in New York. S&P Global President and Chief Executive Officer Martina Cheung and executives will discuss how S&P Global is "advancing essential intelligence" to enable its customers to make more confident decisions and remain a step ahead with S&P Global's industry-leading solutions.
